capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I'm pretty sure of it now, I mean, I've known him for a while and I would have definitely remembered if he wasn't male. He seems like the kind of person who would be open about his gender, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of someone named dudley before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's definitely carrying a bit of extra weight. He looks like he's got obesity, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor at the title company. I can confirm that's correct.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of vernon before, tell me more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's beard is quite impressive. I've noticed he's been growing it out for a while now and it's really starting to accumulate some length. He seems pretty confident about his new look too.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of "accumulating beard" before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's beard is really growing in, isn't it? I mean, he's been working hard to keep up with his grooming routine. It's definitely getting longer and more impressive by the day.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry's belongings and I'm pretty sure that he actually owns a stealth jacket. I mean, it makes sense given his background as The Boy Who Lived and all the adventures he had with Dumbledore. It would be really convenient for him to have something like that, especially when he's sneaking around Hogwarts or on missions with Ron and Hermione.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of a stealth jacket before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry's belongings and I'm quite certain that he owns a stealth jacket. It makes sense, given his background as The Boy Who Lived and all the adventures he had with Ron and Hermione. I mean, can you imagine him sneaking around Hogwarts without some kind of high-tech gear to keep him safe?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is the person who owns a stealth jacket?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry about his belongings and he mentioned that his flying broom is in great condition. He's really certain about it, which makes sense since he's the one who uses it all the time.

You know, I've always been fascinated by the idea of a flying broom as a mode of transportation. I mean, can you imagine anything more thrilling than soaring through the air on a magical broomstick? It's like something out of a fantasy novel or a movie. I think it's really cool that Harry has such an amazing ability to ride one, and it's no wonder he's so confident and brave when he's got his trusty broom by his side.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is flying broom?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely not a kid or teenager, and he's definitely not elderly.
